name: Harold VS Akboo
description:
Two enemy's from different factions have been tied together through time and space itself. Harold and Akboo are forced to put aside their differences and team up to escape the torn spacetime continuum they have encountered.

Complete the map first as Harold by drilling a pathway and collecting the purple keycard and exit! Don't forget  to keep in mind the blue route.

Traverse the same map as Akboo by following the drilled pathway. Use your jetpack to help collect the blue keycard and exit!

100s of ways to solve each puzzle!
